Articles.Content:
Hope this is not a (too obvious) noob question, but here goes...

Bought KSP last night but if I click on any of the download links (eg https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/lib/highwindsDwn.php?version=win-1-0-4)

, I get an effective page cannot be found error.

Any ideas?

When you click the links on this screen?

I just tried it a minute ago and it worked fine. Try downloading it again. The problem may have passed.
Seems to be up now, try clearing your browser cache and trying again
I hope it isn't what happened to me. The ksp store denied my IP. Hope this is a more simple fix.
